nodes.text: Nerve toxins were a type of poisonous weaponized gas. The Nihil, a group of anarchic pirates which operated during the High Republic Era, used gases like nerve toxins in their attacks, wearing breath masks to protect themselves. Tempest Runner Lourna Dee utilized a special toxin created for her by a poisoner on Nar Shaddaa, which she kept secret from the other Tempests.
